full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### W3713-24KN01 Responsive Maintenance Services - CFHA - Kingston

*   **Tender Title in English:** Responsive Maintenance Services - CFHA - Kingston
*   **Tender Title in French:** Services d'entretien corrective - L'Agence de logement des Forces canadiennes - Kingston

#### Key Details

| Category | Description | Value |
| --- | --- | --- |
| **Reference Number** | WS4263653525-Doc4263702945 | N/A |
| **Amendment Number** | 3 | N/A |
| **Publication Date** | 2023-11-02 | N/A |
| **Tender Closing Date** | 2023-12-19 (14:00 EST) | N/A |
| **Expected Contract Start Date** | 2024-04-01 | N/A |
| **Expected Contract End Date** | 2026-03-31 | N/A |
| **Contracting Entity** | Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) | N/A |
| **Procurement Category** | SRV | N/A |
| **Notice Type** | Request for Standing Offer (RFx) | N/A |
| **Method of Procurement** | Competitive - Open Bidding | N/A |

#### Trade Agreements

The tender is open to suppliers who are able to fulfill the requirements of the following trade agreements:

*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

#### Quote Submission

The tender description is provided below:
